code: import React from"react";import{updateTask,deleteTask}from"../services/taskService";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function TaskList(_ref){let{tasks,onUpdate}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"list-group",children:tasks.map(task=>{const isDone=Number(task.is_done)===1;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{className:"list-group-item d-flex justify-content-between align-items-center",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:task.title})," \u2013 ",task.description,/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:`badge ms-2 ${isDone?"badge-done":"badge-pending"}`,children:isDone?"Done":"Pending"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("button",{className:"btn btn-sm btn-custom me-2",onClick:()=>updateTask({...task,is_done:isDone?0:1}).then(onUpdate),children:["Mark ",isDone?"Pending":"Done"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"btn btn-sm btn-danger",onClick:()=>deleteTask(task.id).then(onUpdate),children:"Delete"})]})]},task.id);})});}export default TaskList;
